characters.name: Cow
characters.description: A spotted cow with black and white patches, large brown eyes, and a pink nose. Has short ears and a long tail. Appears to be airborne, capturing a jumping motion.

scenes.background_description: A serene night sky under a blanket of twinkling stars, with a bright full moon casting a gentle glow across the tranquil landscape. Below, rolling hills are softly illuminated by the moonlight, adding a touch of magic to the scene. The environment is depicted in a storybook illustration style with whimsical, calming colors and gentle textures.
scenes.narration_text: In the stillness of the night, a cow decided to jump over the moon.

scenes.background_description: A fantastical view with the moon up close, surrounded by a myriad of glittering stars. The cow is seen majestically leaping, silhouetted against the bright orb, adding a whimsical charm to the night. The composition is styled in a classic storybook illustration with vibrant and dreamy colors.
scenes.narration_text: With a mighty leap, the cow soared gracefully over the moon.
